data.title: Phase One XF Camera System • Medium Format Cameras, Phase One System, XF Camera System • Teamwork Photo
data.meta_description: The Phase One XF Camera System is the ultimate creative companion for professional photographers looking to customize and streamline their workflow and deliver the best image quality. With a modular design that allows for a high degree of customization, integration with supporting systems and alternative camera systems, and a powerful connection with Capture One, every photographer can capture with their ideal workflow. Focused on the future, the XF Camera System and IQ digital backs are continuously updated, so that you change with technology, with the camera you already have.
data.meta_site_name: Teamwork Photo - Photographic Store in London
data.text:
Description

Phase One XF Camera System

Stand out in a big way

The Phase One XF Camera System is the ultimate creative companion for professional photographers looking to customize and streamline their workflow and deliver the best image quality. With a modular design that allows for a high degree of customization, integration with supporting systems and alternative camera systems, and a powerful connection with Capture One, every photographer can capture with their ideal workflow. Focused on the future, the XF Camera System and IQ digital backs are continuously updated, so that you change with technology, with the camera you already have.

The Quality Advantage. Large Imaging Sensors

Using full-frame Medium Format sensors 2.5 times larger than the ones found in high-end DSLRs, the new Phase One XF Camera System delivers a powerful combination of the highest possible resolution together with large, high dynamic range pixels with exceptional wide angular response.

Up to 150 Megapixel

Perfect 16bit colour

15+ stop dynamic range

60 minutes exposure

Ready for 150MP, and beyond.

Compatible with more than 60 lenses, the Phase One XF Camera System offers high-resolution lenses for all types of professional applications

Schneider Kreuznach optics

1/1600th Fast Flash Synchronisation

Full ranges of Focal Plane and Leaf shutter Primes and Zooms

Powerful and Simple. The new OneTouch UI.

Being the first to embrace new technology and integrate a touch based user interface to a digital back, Phase One continue the tradition with the XF Camera System and the OneTouch UI.

3 customisable dials

2 Touch screens

Sophisticated auto-exposure

Waist level finder. A re-born classic

As if the brightest full frame prism viewfinder wasn’t enough, the Phase One XF Camera System introduces a new modular waist level finder, the first of its kind to deliver light metering and auto-exposure.

New Autofocus Platform

With the XF, Phase One are introducing a new patent pending, and fully Phase One developed, autofocus system; The Honeybee Autofocus Platform (HAP-2). Using a unique floating-point architecture and a fully programmable interface, HAP-2 is the most precise Phase One system ever built and will be easy to expand for years to come

HAP-2 CMOS Sensor & Processor

Highest precision

Hyperfocal point focusing

Better. Faster. Stronger.

Phase One Systems have been used for decades in some of the most demanding professional and aerial applications. With the XF Camera System they have upgraded all moving parts and materials, delivering the fastest, most robust and most reliable camera system they have ever made.

Fastest response time

Most reliable

Upgradeable Camera OS

An unstoppable combination

Phase One’s hardware and software teams have worked closer than ever to perfectly develop the IIQ RAW file, allowing all elements to play in perfect harmony. Images have never looked better.
